title: Hello, my name is
description: I'm a technology and design enthusiast working as a front-end developer at Luizalabs. I graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from the University of Passo Fundo (UPF). Additionally, I'm passionate about web and mobile technologies and constantly seeking new knowledge. I consider myself a proactive, communicative person who enjoys working in teams. I created this portfolio to showcase a bit about myself. I hope you like it!
